column4: I am copying ubuntu partitions to another disk using clonezilla, do i need to edit /etc/fstab or will it automatically add the new partitions? any suggestions
im quite sure a grub-update will sufice
chroot to it, and run a grub-update, still im not too sure on that one
grup-update is after booting in to ubuntu, I want to know if it will boot in the first place
